## Weather

### callZip

Make a new instance of class const myWeather = new Weather(myAPIKey, Unit:optional)
myWeather.callZip(myZip).then((json) => {
     json.temp
}).catch((error) => {console.log(`In method temp(line 34): ${error}`)})
